thread.title: Eagles head coach Chip Kelly's press conference: LIVE updates, instant analysis
thread.title_full: Eagles head coach Chip Kelly's press conference: LIVE updates, instant analysis | NJ.com

author: Matt Lombardo | For NJ Advance Media
title: Eagles head coach Chip Kelly's press conference: LIVE updates, instant analysis
text:
PHILADELPHIA -- Make no mistake about it, Sunday's game against the New Orleans Saints at Lincoln Financial Field carries the weight of the rest of the season on its outcome.
With an offensive line decimated by injuries and a locker room trying to find an identity after losing 6 of the last 8 regular season games, Eagles head coach Chip Kelly must deliver a victory to against the Saints for there to be any realistic shot at climbing back into the playoff conversation after a 1-3 start.
EAGLES VS. SAINTS: Drew Brees calls Darren Sproles 'epitome of a teammate'
Kelly's final press conference of the week is scheduled for 11:45 Thursday morning prior to practice at the NovaCare Complex where everything from the status of five injured players to the game plan for containing Drew Brees and company will likely be discussed.
NJ Advance Media's Eliot Shorr-Parks , Mark Eckel and Matt Lombardo will be on the scene and you can follow live updates and instant analysis of Kelly's press conference below:
Tweets about #eagles AND From:@EliotShorrParks OR From:@MattLombardo975 OR From:@MarkEckel08 OR From:@rosenstein73
